```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

matrixpower <- function(mat,k) {
	if (k == 0) return (diag(dim(mat)[1])) 
	if (k == 1) return(mat)
	if (k > 1) return( mat %*% matrixpower(mat, k-1))
}

p_mat <- matrix(c(0,1,0,0,
                     1/4,0,3/4,0,
                     0,1/4,0,3/4,
                     0,0,1,0),nrow=4)

p <- matrixpower(p_mat,3)
p
```
